Jachin and Boaz, or, The stedfast and unwavering Christian being a serious perswasive to constancy in the faith, and to perseverance in the true Protestant religion, against all objections, temptations, oppositions and sollicitations to the contrary / by John Hume ... Hume, John, 1634 or 5-1692.

Printed for Simon Miller ..., London : 1676.
